WARNING_nonstandard_garbage_format_below: at least this is readable from a script unlike the pdf

realtime_datum_RO.name: pv_input_voltage
realtime_datum_RO.description: PV array input voltage; Solar charge controller--PV array voltage

realtime_datum_RO.name: batt_rtvoltage
realtime_datum_RO.description: real time battery voltage; undocumented in ControllerProtocolV2.3 table but mentioned in example

realtime_datum_RO.name: eq_temp
realtime_datum_RO.description: temperature inside equipment; temperature inside case

realtime_datum_RO.name: batt_soc
realtime_datum_RO.description: battery SOC; The percentage of battery's remaining capacity

realtime_datum_RO.name: batt_tempr
realtime_datum_RO.description: The battery temperature measured by remote temperature sensor

realtime_status_RO.name: batt_status
realtime_status_RO.description:
D3-D0: 01H Overvolt , 00H Normal ,
02H Under Volt, 03H Low Volt
Disconnect, 04H Fault
D7-D4: 00H Normal, 01H Over
Temp.(Higher than the warning
settings), 02H Low Temp.(Lower
than the warning settings),
D8: Battery inner resistance
abnormal 1,
normal 0
D15: 1-Wrong identification for rated
voltage

00F0h.1: over temp (higher than the warning setting E24)
00F0h.2: low temp (lower than the warning setting E25)

realtime_status_RO.name: qu_charging_status
realtime_status_RO.description:
charging equipment status;
D15-D14: Input volt status. 00
normal, 01 no
power connected, 02H Higher volt
input, 03H
Input volt error.
D13: Charging MOSFET is short.
D12: Charging or Anti-reverse
MOSFET is short.
D11: Anti-reverse MOSFET is short.
D10: Input is over current.
D9: The load is Over current.
D8: The load is short.
D7: Load MOSFET is short.
D4: PV Input is short.
D3-2: Charging status. 00 No
charging,01 Float,02
Boost, 03 Equalization.
D1: 0 Normal, 1 Fault.
D0: 1 Running, 0 Standby.

1000h.1: charging or anti-reverse MOSFET is short.

realtime_status_RO.name: eq_discharging_status
realtime_status_RO.description:
equipment discharging status
D15-D14: 00H normal, 01H low,
02H High, 03H no access
Input volt error.
D13-D12: output power:00-light
load,01-moderate,02-rated,03-overlo
ad
D11: short circuit
D10: unable to discharge
D9: unable to stop discharging
D8: output voltage abnormal
D7: input overpressure
D6: high voltage side short circuit
D5: boost overpressure
D4: output overpressure
D1: 0 Normal, 1 Fault.
D0: 1 Running, 0 Standby.

stats_RO.name: pv_max_volt_d
stats_RO.description: maximum PV voltage today, 00:00 refresh every day

stats_RO.name: pv_min_volt_d
stats_RO.description: minimum PV voltage today, 00:00 refresh every day

stats_RO.name: batt_max_volt_d
stats_RO.description: maximum battery voltage today, 00:00 refresh every day

stats_RO.name: batt_min_volt_d
stats_RO.description: minimum battery voltage today, 00:00 refresh every day

stats_RO.name: e_consumed_d
stats_RO.description: consumed energy today, 00:00 clear every day

stats_RO.name: e_consumed_m
stats_RO.description: consumed energy this month, 00:00 clear on the first day of month

stats_RO.name: e_consumed_y
stats_RO.description: consumed energy this year, 00:00 clear on 1, Jan

stats_RO.name: e_generated_d
stats_RO.description: generated energy today, 00:00 clear every day

stats_RO.name: e_generated_m
stats_RO.description: generated energy this month, 00:00 clear on first day of month

stats_RO.name: e_generated_y
stats_RO.description: generated energy this year, 00:00 clear on 1, Jan

registers_RW.name: batt_type
registers_RW.description: battery type, 1=sealed, 2=GEL, 3=flooded, 0=user defined

registers_RW.name: batt_rated_capacity
registers_RW.description: battery capacity, rated capacity of battery

registers_RW.name: temperature_compensation_coefficient
registers_RW.description: temperature compensation coefficient, range 0-9

registers_RW.name: high_volt_disocnnect
registers_RW.description: high volt disocnnect

registers_RW.name: charging_limit_voltage
registers_RW.description: charging limit voltage

registers_RW.name: over_voltage_reconnect
registers_RW.description: over voltage reconnect

registers_RW.name: equalization_voltage
registers_RW.description: equalization voltage

registers_RW.name: boost_voltage
registers_RW.description: boost voltage

registers_RW.name: float_voltage
registers_RW.description: float voltage

registers_RW.name: boost_reconnect_voltage
registers_RW.description: boost reconnect voltage

registers_RW.name: low_voltage_reconnect
registers_RW.description: low voltage reconnect

registers_RW.name: under_voltage_recover
registers_RW.description: under voltage recover

registers_RW.name: under_voltage_warning
registers_RW.description: under voltage warning

registers_RW.name: low_voltage_disconnect
registers_RW.description: low voltage disconnect

registers_RW.name: discharging_limit_voltage
registers_RW.description: discharging limit voltage

registers_RW.name: real_time_clock
registers_RW.description:
real time clock sec,min,hour,day,month,year;
D7-0 Sec, D15-8 Min.
(Year, Month, Day, Hour, Min, Sec.
should be written simultaneously)

registers_RW.name: battery_temperature_warning_upper_limit
registers_RW.description: battery temperature warning upper limit

registers_RW.name: battery_temperature_warning_lower_limit
registers_RW.description: battery temperature warning lower limit

registers_RW.name: controller_inner_temperature_upper_limit
registers_RW.description: controller inner temperature upper limit

registers_RW.name: controller_inner_temperature_upper_limit_recover
registers_RW.description: controller inner temperature upper limit recover. Over Temperature, system recover once it drop to lower than this value

registers_RW.name: day_time_threshold_volt
registers_RW.description: day time threshold volt (DTTV), PV lower than this value, controller would detect it as sundown

registers_RW.name: light_signal_startup_night_delay_time
registers_RW.description: light signal startup (night) delay time, PV voltage lower than NTTV, and duration exceeds the Light signal startup (night) delay time, controller would detect it as night time

registers_RW.name: light_time_threshold_volt
registers_RW.description: light time threshold volt (NTTV), PV voltage higher than this value, controller would detect it as sunrise

registers_RW.name: light_signal_close_day_delay_time
registers_RW.description: light signal close (day) delay time, PV voltage higher than DTTV, and duration exceeds the Light signal close (day) delay time, controller would detect it as day time

registers_RW.name: load_controlling_modes
registers_RW.description: load controlling modes, 0=manual, 1=light on/off, 2=light on+timer, 3=time control

registers_RW.name: working_time_length_1
registers_RW.description: Working time length 1. The length of load output timer1, D15-D8: hour , D7-D0: minute

registers_RW.name: working_time_length_2
registers_RW.description: Working time length 2. The length of load output timer2, D15-D8: hour , D7-D0: minute

registers_RW.name: turn_on_timing_1
registers_RW.description: Turn on timing 1. Turn on timing of load output

registers_RW.name: turn_off_timing_1
registers_RW.description: Turn off timing 1. Turn off timing of load output

registers_RW.name: turn_on_timing_2
registers_RW.description: Turn on timing 2. Turn on timing of load output

registers_RW.name: turn_off_timing_2
registers_RW.description: Turn off timing 2, Turn off timing of load output

registers_RW.name: backlight_time
registers_RW.description: Backlight time. Close after LCD backlight light setting the number of seconds

registers_RW.name: night_length
registers_RW.description: Length of night. Set default values of the whole night length of time. D15-D8: hour, D7-D0: minute

registers_RW.name: main_power_supply
registers_RW.description: Device configure of main power supply. 1=battery is main, 2= AC-DC power mainly

registers_RW.name: batt_rated_voltage_code
registers_RW.description: battery rated voltage code. 0, auto recognize. 1-12V, 2-24V ,3-36V，4-48V，5-60V， 6-110V，7-120V，8-220V，9-240V

registers_RW.name: manual_default_load_onoff
registers_RW.description: Default Load On/Off in manual mode, 0=off, 1=on

registers_RW.name: equalize_duration
registers_RW.description: Equalize duration. Usually 0-120 minutes

registers_RW.name: boost_duration
registers_RW.description: Boost duration. Usually 10-120 minutes

registers_RW.name: discharging_percentage
registers_RW.description: Usually 20%-80%. The percentage of battery's remaining capacity when stop charging

registers_RW.name: charging_percentage
registers_RW.description: depth of charge, 100%

registers_RW.name: charging_management_modes
registers_RW.description: Management modes of battery charge and discharge, voltage compensation: 0 and SOC: 1

coils_RW.name: charging_device_onoff
coils_RW.description: 1 charging device on, 0 charging device off

coils_RW.name: output_control_mode
coils_RW.description: output control mode manual/automatic. 1 output control mode manual, 0 output control mode automatic

coils_RW.name: manual_control_onoff
coils_RW.description: Manual control the load. When the load is manual mode, 1=manual on, 0=manual off

coils_RW.name: default_control_onoff
coils_RW.description: Default control the load. When the load is default mode, 1=manual on, 0=manual off

coils_RW.name: enable_load_test_mode
coils_RW.description: Enable load test mode. 1 enable, 0 disable (normal)

coils_RW.name: force_load_onoff
coils_RW.description: force the load on/off. 1 turn on, 0 turn off (used for temporary test of the load)

coils_RW.name: clear_generating_electricity_statistics
coils_RW.description: clear generating electricity statistics. 1 clear. Root privileges to perform

discrete_inputs_RO.name: over_temperature_flag
discrete_inputs_RO.description: Over temperature inside the device. 1 The temperature inside the controller is higher than the over-temperature protection point. 0 Normal
